title: [FEA] Support reading Avro

labels.name: epic
labels.description: Issue that encompasses a significant feature or body of work

labels.name: cudf_dependency
labels.description: An issue or PR with this label depends on a new feature in cudf

body:
This is the epic issue to trace the tasks for reading Avro.
cuDF has some basic support on reading Avro. 

## High priority
- [x] Avro: cuDF JNI support
- [Primitve types](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#schema_primitive)
  - [x] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/4935 (Numeric, Boolean, String)
  - [x] Check how Spark/cuDF handle null values for primitive types.
- [Logical types](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#Logical+Types)
  - [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/4982 (cudf_dependency)
  - [ ] Support decimal type. NOTE: [the decimal in avro can be backed by fixed or bytes](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#Decimal) (cudf_dependency)
- [Complex types](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#schema_complex)
  - [ ] Support Array type (cudf_dependency)
  - [ ] Support Record type ([Spark maps to StructType](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-data-sources-avro.html#supported-types-for-avro---spark-sql-conversion)) (cudf_dependency)
  - [ ] Support Map type (cudf_dependency)
- [ ] Support [avro read options](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-data-sources-avro.html#data-source-option)
- [ ] Support [avro read configurations](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-data-sources-avro.html#configuration)
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/5018  (cudf_dependency)
- [ ] Add integration tests for reading avro files with corrupt files
- [ ] #5691 
## Low priority
- [x] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/4983
- [x] #5148
- [x] #5149
- [x] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/5312
- [x] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/5347
- [ ] Support pushed down filters for Avro
- [ ] More tests to cover all the compression types.
- [ ] Support the `from_avro`  SQL function running on GPU
## Needs Triage
- [Primitve types](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#schema_primitive)
  - [x] Check how Spark/cuDF handle columns of [null type](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#schema_primitive). 
  - [ ] Support null type (Can support on plugin side in post-handling)
  - [ ] Support the Bytes type ([cuDF native supports it by mapping to string](https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/blob/branch-22.04/cpp/src/io/avro/reader_impl.cu#L70), differing from the Spark mapping to BinaryType) (cudf_dependency)
- [Logical types](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#Logical+Types)
  - [ ] Check the support of Local timestamp (millisecond and microsecond precision and ) in Spark (If yes, add a new task for adding the support)
  - [ ] Check the support of Time (millisecond and microsecond precision and ) in Spark (If yes, add a new task for adding the support)
  - [ ] Check the support of UUID and Duration in Spark (If yes, add a new task for adding the support)
- [Complex types](https://avro.apache.org/docs/1.10.2/spec.html#schema_complex)
  - [ ] Support Enum type, ([cuDF native supports it by mapping to String or INT32](https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/blob/branch-22.04/cpp/src/io/avro/reader_impl.cu#L72), but [Spark maps only to StringType](https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-data-sources-avro.html#supported-types-for-avro---spark-sql-conversion).) (cudf_dependency)
  - [ ] Support Fixed type (cudf_dependency)
  - [ ] Support Union type (cudf_dependency)
